Metadata.Title: CVE-2023-6816 affecting package xorg-x11-server for versions less than 1.20.10-10
Metadata.Description: CVE-2023-6816 affecting package xorg-x11-server for versions less than 1.20.10-10. A patched version of the package is available.

Criterion.Comment: Package xorg-x11-server is earlier than 1.20.10-10, affected by CVE-2023-6816
